It's going to be a jump and run and is my first game. It's written in Java. Everything was/will be created with free programms:

Coding → Eclipse
Graphics → Gimp
Sounds → LMMS
OS → Ubuntu  12.04

EVERYTHING IS/WAS SELFEMADE !!!!!

After releasing the full version I'll publish the source code and everyone can use it to make own games.

Updates will follow.
Current version: 0.2.6.3
